posts.post_content:
Two high grade examples of Bob Caruthers from the beautiful 1888 N162 set of 8 baseball players. Incredibly tough cards. I will entertain offers, but asking prices are below. Will cut a significant deal if you take both.

PSA 4: $SOLD
PSA 4.5: $4,150

This is the only photo I have on my computer at the moment, but I am happy to provide additional photos upon request.

[IMG]http://www.net54baseball.com/attachment.php?attachmentid=651958&d=1740071282[/IMG]

Thanks,

Daniel
Bump for sale. 4.5 is still available.
